pages.title: Liquid Fuels
pages.text: Rockets require specific liquid fuels from ChemLib Mekanized:$(br)$(br)$(bold)Tier 1:$() Liquid Ethanol$(br)$(bold)Tier 2:$() Liquid Propane$(br)$(bold)Tier 3:$() Liquid Ethylene or Mekanism Ethene$(br)$(bold)Tier 4:$() Liquid Methane$(br)$(br)Each rocket tier only accepts its designated fuel type.

pages.title: Fueling Your Rocket
pages.text: To fuel a rocket:$(br)1. Place the rocket on a Launch Pad$(br)2. Right-click the rocket to open its GUI$(br)3. Insert fuel buckets or use a fluid transport system$(br)4. The fuel gauge will show current fuel level$(br)$(br)Each launch consumes a set amount of fuel - make sure you have enough before launching!
